overview: Lock your doors, close your blinds, and be home before curfew, because there’s a killer on the loose. A small suburban town is practically in marshall law because of a serial killer who can’t be caught. Police have the streets under constant surveillance, but nothing, no sign of them.  Home Sweet Home throws us right in the middle of a night where the killer has chosen a new family of unsuspecting victims. This little horror-thriller packs quite the punch with an ending you’ll never see coming.
title: Home Sweet Home
